attributes.action: Make June 21st a bank holiday / the amended date set by the government for covid
attributes.additional_details: This will help peoples mental health, give them a date to look forward to and reinstate confidence in the government
attributes.background: Make 21st of June or the amended date a national bank holiday or a holiday where everyone has a day of. We have lived in lockdown for years, many who list their jobs, furloughed or worked. So let’s all stop for a day take a breath and enjoy freedom

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205

Extra Bank Holiday when Covid restrictions are finally lifted
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563958
